name: Fountain of Youth (startmovego)
description:
The Fountain of Youth is a modern dungeon crawler following the story of a young adventurer that stumbles into a well and must fight his way out. Battle hordes of slimey creatures and a final boss while switching between three unique characters in this submission for Brackey's  Game Jam 2022.1.  

This is our first submission to a game jam and we'll certainly be back for more!

Development by Shane Buchan
Art and Design by @thenamesnick
Sound Mixing by Kevin Jones
Instrumentation by Stefan Anschutz & Michel Nahas
